titleStmt.title: To each gentleman soldier in the company [of] Captain John Hulls, captain in the Yellow regiment of trained bands of London.
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, Thomas, fl. 1695?

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Tho your great actions I need not rehearse ..."
Imperfect: torn at edge with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
